descriptions.de: Ein Alarmverzeichnis kann zur Ordnung verschiedener Alarme verwendet werden. Die Klasse ist unique, d.h. es kann auf oberster Ebene nur ein Objekt dieser Klasse existieren.
descriptions.ru:
The class Alarm Directory represents a specific directory for the management of alarms.

The class is unique, which means that it is not possible to create a object of this class in parallel to an already existing object of the same class.
descriptions.en: A Alarm Directory can be used for the sortation of alarms. The class is unique, which means that it is not possible to create a object of this class in parallel to an already existing object of the same class.
